channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MS

item.title: Report X-2024040762
item.description:
Report X-2024040762

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-19T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-11
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Due to improper handling of the package, the contents began to leak. DescribePack: The top became loose causing it to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package and contents were collected and adjusted to stop leakage.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Description: SequenceEvent: package found leaking and hazmat materials were used to clean spillage.. DescribePack: loose cap caused leakage from inside box which caused the fiberboard to be wet and torn off. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: hazmat materials were used.
